metadata.name: Potential SAM Database Dump
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of files that look like exports of the local SAM (Security Account Manager)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\temp\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.sav')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\intel\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.hive')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\perflogs\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\programdata\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\users\\public\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('_shadowsteal.zip')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\documents\\sam.export')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower(':\\sam'))) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\hive_sam_')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.save')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.export')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\~reg_sam.save')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam_backup')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.bck')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam.backup'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of files that look like exports of the local SAM (Security Account Manager)

metadata.objective: False positive: Rare cases of administrative activity References: https://github.com/search?q=CVE-2021-36934, https://web.archive.org/web/20210725081645/https://github.com/cube0x0/CVE-2021-36934, https://www.google.com/search?q=%22reg.exe+save%22+sam, https://github.com/HuskyHacks/ShadowSteal, https://github.com/FireFart/hivenightmare
